channel.title: What do you look for in a server?
channel.description: I'm starting a new server based off WhiteScape, and once I fix all the obvious bugs (picking up items, all shop bugs, etc.) I plan on working on following, new skills and a bunch of other stuff. So basically what I need are some ideas on what I should add. Thanks in advance.

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @pljay03 pljay03
item.description:
@pljay03 wrote:

Thanks for the tips guys.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @bubabaa bubabaa
item.description:
@bubabaa wrote:

I find quests and mini-games good in a server too aswell as the other suggestions this far

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

Stability. So it won’t crash in the middle of working, it doesn’t need “anti-lag” code or whatever, it’s just fine in the first place.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @Marc3239099 Marc3239099
item.description:
@Marc3239099 wrote:

Yh, Try and make your server as different as possible -EG- take out all normal mage and ancent teleport spells and just have your server around the ghost town

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @pljay03 pljay03
item.description:
@pljay03 wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:3, topic:190271”]Skills reflecting as much as possible on the actual runescape. e.g not slayer where you train on a stupid old chest, in my server you train on the actual monsters.

The timing of the special attacks, I wish I knew how to make the special effect be in time with the weapon attack.

Organized shops, imaginative shop owners. Not the same old ghost shopkeeper etc.[/quote]
Those are good ideas, thanks

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

Skills reflecting as much as possible on the actual runescape. e.g not slayer where you train on a stupid old chest, in my server you train on the actual monsters.

The timing of the special attacks, I wish I knew how to make the special effect be in time with the weapon attack.

Organized shops, imaginative shop owners. Not the same old ghost shopkeeper etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?

item.title: What do you look for in a server?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

Tall, smart and funny. I like a good personality, I don’t go for the tall dark and handsome like all my friends. I like the different servers, the one I can tell my secrets to. The one I can spend late nights with only hugging and telling eachother how much I love you, my dream server is out there somewhere… somewhere.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you look for in a server?
